Attacks.Name: Peck
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, this character may make a free Move action.

Attacks.Name: Fury Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Doduo may make an additional Fury Attack without paying the cost. The additional attack must target the original character.

Superpowers.Name: Run Away
Superpowers.Effect: This character may reroll all defense dice when targeted by an attack from a character that is within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Early Bird
Superpowers.Effect: If this character has the Sleep special condition, it wakes up at the start of its activation instead of the end.

Superpowers.Name: Double Team
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of Doduo's next activation, enemy characters subtract 1 die from their attack rolls when targeting Doduo.

Attacks.Name: Drill Peck
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Doduo gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stagger special condition and is pushed away S distance.

Superpowers.Name: Agility
Superpowers.Effect: Doduo may advance M after being targeted by an enemy attack. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Dodrio character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
